modName: No More Banana Robes - Psijic set recolor
summary: A quick and dirty recolor of the bright yellow banana colored Psijic clothing set
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]If you are looking for independently-craftable robes, visit my much newer mod, Actualize Apparel, found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8772]HERE[/url].[/size][/b]

No More Banana Robes is a mod I churned out in about 10 minutes (at least, that was true for Red Banana, before you ingrates started asking for more :p ), recoloring the well-designed but unfortunately colored Psijic robes, hood, boots, and gloves into a much more respectable red for the well-to-do mage with access to console.

As this is a simple retexture, you\'ll still have to access the console to get the set with \"player.additem\", or download my other mod, \"Craftable Psijic,\" at:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7743

For handy reference, here are the item codes:

Robes: 00065b94
Hood: 00065b99
Boots: 00065b9b
Gloves: 00065b9d

There are five options to choose from. Sadly, I don\'t know how to to add a new item to the game so you can only have one color at a time, as each color variation (Red, Forest, Blue, Albino, and Darth) replaces the Psijic robes. If anyone knows how to make a brand new item and connect it with, say, the forge, and would like to use my textures, I\'d be more than happy to let you, so long as I get some credit. :)

Additionally, if anyone has the location of a good guide for turning these into standalone craftable armor sets, I\'d love to see it.

Enjoy your now substantially more stylish adventures!

If you like this, check out my other retexture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7678
author: wetsail
